document_data.caption: A map showing Coach Street and surroundings in the Southern Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Coach Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Coach Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Coach Street was located in the southern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]]. The road ran east to west, originating in the west in the center of a neighborhood, crossing the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]], and ending on [[Wall Street]] at the [[Trollwall]]. Coach Street was also intersected by [[Carter's Way]].
